Does anyone have sound issues with this one? (You'll know immediately as there should be music in the intro). All sounds work fine on my personal copy, and i assume (??) on downloads. But I didn't get sound when I tried playing online. Perhaps nothing more sinister than a slow connection...

Thanks for any feedback on this!
